semantic_identifier: [GOLD-168]: issue_history v2: Add ownership fields + assignment events to issue history model
title: issue_history v2: Add ownership fields + assignment events to issue history model

sections.text: Extend the issue_history v2 data model to support explicit ownership (current owner, team, and assignee source) and record ownership changes as first-class timeline events. Update ingestion/sync so assignments from connected delivery tools (e.g., Linear/Jira) and manual triage actions are persisted consistently. Ensure ownership can be queried and displayed alongside other issue history events to enable downstream SLA timers and decision notes.
